title.string: Around the world - the school trip around the world with t-shirts, books, geography and fieldwork swirled.

description.string: 1.stage: "Collecting t-shirts"Students collect t-shirts with a sign on it: name of cites, countries, states, rivers... T-shirts are sorted and analyzed by geographical area and region. Studenst prepare an exhibition of t-shirts in the school hall and classrooms.2.stage: "Telling a story"Lectures and workshops with guests (travel writers, sailors, adventurers and world travelers). Reading and researching travelogues and logbooks.3.stage: "Sail around, fly and experience the world"Creating an itinerary according to the collected shirts by land, see and air. Writing a travel guide.4.stage: "Mathematical Adventures"Calculate the itinerary using the coordinate system.5.stage: "Cultural similarities and differences"Research cultural similarities and differences according to collected t-shirts.6.stage:"Fieldrip"boat ride, visit some place according to collected t-shirts, find and visit a partner-school7.stage: Evaluations
